title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 466.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 466.1 - Scope

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part apply to the implementation
and administration of the CONNECTIONS system. This Part establishes standards
for the internal and external recording of information in the CONNECTIONS
system, the protection of confidential individual identifiable information, the
sealing and expungement of information and the security of the
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
466.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
